Ok, eGroups reports that your email adress hasn't been linked to a 
Yahoo ID (you logged in, but that has no connection with your email, 
and you need to make it have a connection), so now go to 
http://groups.yahoo.com/convwiz and do all the stuff there.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> I went there, signed in (I have an account) and it went to a page 
> with a Yahoo! search form, and a list of Yahoo! links (Business, 
> Computers, Culture, Entertainment, etc.) Where to now?
